subject: Lockouts
Organized Labor
Collective Bargaining
Football
lead_paragraph: For N.F.L. Commissioner Roger Goodell and DeMaurice Smith, the head of the players union, a possible labor agreement will probably define their legacies.
snippet: For N.F.L. Commissioner Roger Goodell and DeMaurice Smith, the head of the players union, a possible labor agreement will probably define their legacies.
